meanings.sent1: Her acquisitivenesses was evident in her constant need to buy new things.
meanings.sent2: His acquisitivenesses led him to collect rare coins from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The acquisitivenesses of the squirrel was on full display as it gathered nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The acquisitivenesses of the entrepreneur knew no bounds as he expanded his business empire.
meanings.sent5: The acquisitivenesses of the child for toys was insatiable.

meanings.definition: The desire to acquire more possessions or wealth.
meanings.sent1: Their acquisitivenesses drove them to seek out the latest gadgets and designer clothes.
meanings.sent2: The acquisitivenesses of the treasure hunter led him on a quest for hidden riches.
meanings.sent3: The acquisitivenesses of the cat was evident as it tried to claim all the toys as its own.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, acquisitivenesses can sometimes lead to unethical practices.
meanings.sent5: The acquisitivenesses of the collector knew no bounds as he sought to add rare items to his collection.
